TEXT.TITLE: RCM TECHNOLOGIES <RCMT.O> WARRANTS EXERCISABLE
TEXT.BODY: RCM Technologies Inc said the Securities and Exchange Commission has declared a post-effective amendment to its registration statement effective, making its warrants exercisable. Reuter
